LockServiceLinkedRole.name: LockServiceLinkedRole
LockServiceLinkedRole.documentation:
IAM SLR Deletion Workflow operation asking us if our SLR can be deleted or not.

We should answer true if there are no internal resources that depend on the SLR for Organization structure sync. We should answer false otherwise.
